name: Mayor's Quest
description:
This project was designed to raise funds and awareness for StreetWise. 

Every dollar make a difference! 

Your support gives a "hand up" to those struggling with homelessness, poverty, and unemployment. StreetWise creates employment opportunities for homeless and individuals experiencing poverty.  Anyone who wants to work has the opportunity to move themselves out of crisis.

Who are StreetWise Vendors?

Subscribe and pay your vendor!

Donate here.
